title: Look for a font, that's I've seen before
content:
I've seen this font before but now I can't find it's name. The smoothed m's and a's seem to make it tricky.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620221052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6714.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620221052/http:/typophile.com/files/font_336.jpg) | 31.89 KB |
author: call on jim

comments.content: One of many versions of [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620221052/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/handel-gothic/) - manually stretched.
Thank you very much, I knew I had seen it, I just couldn't find it.
